name: Sell Media Affiliate Integration
author: naa986

sections.description:
This plugin integrates Affiliate Manager with the Sell Media File plugin so affiliate can earn commission for referring customers to your website.

Requirements

  1. Sell Media File
  2. Affiliates Manager

When a user comes to your site through an affiliate link and purchases something, the plugin will check to see if the sale was referred by an affiliate. It will then give commission to the affiliate accordingly.

For setup instructions please visit the Sell Media plugin page.
sections.installation:
1. Go to the Add New plugins screen in your WordPress Dashboard
  2. Click the upload tab
  3. Browse for the plugin file (sell-media-affiliate.zip) on your computer
  4. Click “Install Now” and then hit the activate button

short_description: Track affiliate commission through the Sell Media File plugin.
